metadata.title: CVE-2022-0332 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle in versions 3.11 to 3.11.4. An SQL injectionrisk was identified in the h5p activity web service responsible forfetching user attempt data.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
